signUpScreenSubtitle: Fill in the form below to create your account
firstNameRequired: First name is required and must be at least 3 characters long.
lastNameRequired: Last name is required and must be at least 3 characters long.
passwordRequired: Must be at least 8 characters long.
signUpSuccess: Account created successfully! Please check your email to verify your account.
signInScreenSubtitle: Sign in to access your account
otpScreenSubtitle: We sent a 6-digit code to your email.
otpScreenDescription: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
lengthCode: The verification code must be 6 digits long.
googleProfileMissingEmail: Google profile is missing an email address.
internalServerError: Internal server error. Please try again later.
accountDeleted: Your account has been deleted successfully. But we hope to see you again in the future.
forgotPasswordScreenSubtitle: Enter your email to receive password reset instructions.
resetPasswordScreenSubtitle: Enter your code sent to your email and set a new password.
agreeToTerms: By clicking continue, you agree to our
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
emailNotVerified: Your email address has not been verified. Please check your email for the verification code.
emailAlreadyVerified: Your email address is already verified. Please log in.
failedToVerifyEmail: Failed to verify email. Please try again later.
verificationEmailResent: Verification email resent successfully. Please check your inbox.
resetCodeSent: If this email is registered, a reset code has been sent.
resetPasswordEmailSent: Reset password email sent successfully. Please check your inbox.
emailAlreadyExistsDescription: It looks like you already have an account with this email. Please log in instead.
emailAlreadyExistsHint: Click the button above to go to the login page
codeExpired: The verification code has expired. A new code has been sent to your email.
accountCreatedDescription: We noticed this is your first time here. Your account has been created successfully!
signInSuccessDescription: You have successfully logged into your account.
name: Name
dateInvalid: Date is required and must be a valid ISO datetime.
totalInvalid: Total must be a valid number with two decimal places.
taxInvalid: Tax must be a valid number with two decimal places.
imageUrlInvalid: Image URL must be a valid URL.
subcategoryIdInvalid: Subcategory ID must be a valid UUID.
dayOfWeekInvalid: Day of week must be an integer between 0 and 6.
startTimeInvalid: Start time must be in HH:mm format.
endTimeInvalid: End time must be in HH:mm format.
serviceNameRequired: Service name is required and must be at least 3 characters.
durationInvalid: Duration must be an integer number of minutes.
staffIdsRequired: At least one staff member must be assigned.
staffIdInvalid: Staff ID must be a valid UUID.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
passwordMaxLength: Password must be at most 100 characters.
urlInvalid: URL must be a valid URL.
clientEmailInvalid: Client email must be a valid email address.
meetingLinkInvalid: Meeting link must be a valid URL.
staffFirstNameRequired: First name is required and must be at least 3 characters.
staffLastNameRequired: Last name is required and must be at least 3 characters.
